com.aeonphyxius.gamecomponents.drawable

Class BackGround

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aeonphyxius.gamecomponents.drawable.BackGround

  • public class BackGround
extends java.lang.Object
    BackGround Object.

    Class to manage a background layer. Contains all logic to display an image as a background,

    and load the texture.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alejandro Santiago
